lang_value: NutritionFacts.org è un servizio pubblico su base scientifica, non commerciale e senza scopo di lucro, offerto dal dottor Greger, che propone quotidiani aggiornamenti gratuiti sulle più recenti scoperte in materia di nutrizione con brevi video. Ne ha prodotto più di duemila, toccando tutti gli aspetti di un’alimentazione sana, ogni volta con nuovi contenuti video e articoli.

base_value: NutritionFacts.org is a non-commercial, non-profit, science-based public service provided by Dr. Greger, delivering free daily updates on the latest in nutrition research via bite-sized videos. lang_value: NutritionFacts.org è un servizio pubblico su base scientifica, non commerciale e senza scopo di lucro, offerto dal dottor Greger, che propone quotidiani aggiornamenti gratuiti sulle più recenti scoperte in materia di nutrizione con brevi video. Ne ha prodotto più di duemila, toccando tutti gli aspetti di un’alimentazione sana, ogni volta con nuovi contenuti video e articoli. Tutto quello che trovate nel sito, così come in questa app, è gratuito e privo di pubblicità.

base_value: In the years of research required to create the more than two-thousand evidence-based videos on his website NutritionFacts.org, Michael Greger, M.D, FACLM, has arrived at a list of what he considers the most important foods to include in a healthy daily diet.
lang_value: Со тек на многу години истражување кои беа потребни за создавање на повеќе од илјада видеа базирани на докази на неговиот веб-сајт NutritionFacts.org, Мајкл Грегер, доктор по медицина, FACLM, состави листа на она што го смета за најважна храна што треба да се вклучи во здравата секојдневна исхрана.

base_value: Dr. Greger’s Daily Dozen details the healthiest foods and how many servings of each we should try to check off every day. He explains his rationale in his book “How Not to Die”.

base_value: In the years of research required to create the more than two-thousand evidence-based videos on his website NutritionFacts.org, Michael Greger, M.D, FACLM, has arrived at a list of what he considers the most important foods to include in a healthy daily diet.
lang_value: مایکل گرِگِر، پزشک و عضوِ کالجِ آمریکاییِ پزشکیِ مبتنی‌بر سبکِ زندگی، طیِ سال‌ها پژوهش که لازمۀ تولیدِ بیش از دو هزار ویدئوی مستند بر روی وبسایتش NutritionFacts.org بود، به فهرستی دست‌ یافته است که ازنظرِ او حاویِ مهمترین غذاها در رژیمِ غذاییِ سالمِ روزانه است.

base_value: NutritionFacts.org is a non-commercial, non-profit, science-based public service provided by Dr. Greger, delivering free daily updates on the latest in nutrition research via bite-sized videos. He has more than two-thousand videos on every aspect of healthy eating, with new videos and articles uploaded every day.
lang_value: وبسایتِ NutritionFacts.org یک خدمتِ عمومیِ غیرتجاری، غیرانتفاعی و مبتنی‌بر علم است که از طرفِ دکتر گرِگِر ارائه شده و هرروزه ویدئو‌های کوتاهِ رایگانی دربارۀ جدیدترین تحقیقاتِ انجام‌شده در حوزۀ تغذیه منتشر می‌کند. ایشان نزدیک به دو هزار ویدئو در‌ رابطه با تمامِ جنبه‌های تغذیۀ سالم دارد، همراه با ویدئوها و مقالات تازه‌ای که هر روز بر روی وبسایت آپلود می‌شوند.

lang_value: وبسایتِ NutritionFacts.org یک خدمتِ عمومیِ غیرتجاری، غیرانتفاعی و مبتنی‌بر علم است که از طرفِ دکتر گرِگِر ارائه شده و هرروزه ویدئو‌های کوتاهِ رایگانی دربارۀ جدیدترین تحقیقاتِ انجام‌شده در حوزۀ تغذیه منتشر می‌کند. ایشان نزدیک به دو هزار ویدئو در رابطه با تمامِ جنبه‌های تغذیۀ سالم دارد، همراه با ویدئوها و مقالات تازه‌ای که هر روز بر روی وبسایت آپلود می‌شوند. همانندِ این اپ، هرآنچه که در وبسایت ارائه‌شده نیز رایگان و خالی از تبلیغات است.

base_value: In the years of research required to create the more than two-thousand evidence-based videos on his website NutritionFacts.org, Michael Greger, M.D, FACLM, has arrived at a list of what he considers the most important foods to include in a healthy daily diet.
lang_value: Podczas lat badań potrzebnych do stworzenia ponad tysiąca, popartych dowodami, nagrań wideo na swoją stronę NutritionFacts.org, Michael Greger (lekarz, współzałożyciel i członek honorowy American College of Lifestyle Medicine) opracował listę tego, co uważa za najważniejsze produkty spożywcze, które należy uwzględnić w zdrowej codziennej diecie.

base_value: NutritionFacts.org is a non-commercial, non-profit, science-based public service provided by Dr. Greger, delivering free daily updates on the latest in nutrition research via bite-sized videos. He has more than two-thousand videos on every aspect of healthy eating, with new videos and articles uploaded every day.
lang_value: NutritionFacts.org to niekomercyjna, non-profit usługa publiczna, oparta na nauce i świadczona przez dr. Gregera. Zapewnia codzienne bezpłatne aktualizacje na temat najnowszych badań żywieniowych w formie krótkich filmów. Dr Greger ma prawie tysiąc nagrań na temat każdego aspektu zdrowego odżywiania, a każdego dnia przesyłane są nowe filmy i artykuły.

base_value: Dr. Greger’s Daily Dozen - It’s your regular routine that determines your long-term health. Download today!
lang_value: Codzienny Tuzin doktora Gregera To twoje zwyczaje decydują o twoim zdrowiu. Pobierz już dziś!
lang_note: The “regular routine” is a bit of a tautology here and it doesn't feel right to me, neither does the “long-term health” when translated to Polish word by word. I changed it slightly in such a way that it sounds more natural now in Polish, preserving the message/meaning - it is “It's your habits that determine your health.”.

base_value: All proceeds from his books, DVDs, and speaking engagements are donated to charity.

lang_note: In some cases “dr” is going to appear here with a “.” (dot) and in some other not - it is a subject of Polish orthography rules. It all depends on the grammatical case (there are 7 in Polish).

base_value: In the years of research required to create the more than two-thousand evidence-based videos on his website NutritionFacts.org, Michael Greger, M.D, FACLM, has arrived at a list of what he considers the most important foods to include in a healthy daily diet.
lang_value: În anii de cercetare necesari pentru a crea cele peste o mie de videoclipuri bazate pe dovezi de pe site-ul său NutritionFacts.org, Dr. Michael Greger a ajuns la o listă cu ceea ce el consideră a fi cele mai importante alimente ce trebuiesc incluse într-o dietă zilnică sănătoasă.
lang_note: There is no correspondent in Romanian for FACLM, however for MD there is the abbreviation Dr. (from Doctor) and it is used before the name. So we either just use the existent one, or we add both but in English - so we leave M.D., FACLM. Or we translate FACLM abbreviation which in Romanian would be ACAMSV. We would need Dr. Greger's approval to use any of these versions.
